text: Ma3a 7uduth attaghyir min rub3 mil ila nisf mil, tusbi7 assur3a aqal ahamiya bi kathir wa yusbi7 atta7amul darura quswa.

Wa tamyyaza al-barnamaj fil asas bi-taqdim sawt al-mumathilin al-huwat al-ma3rufin li East Texas.

Arriyadha athaljiya 3ala al-mun7adarat, wa allaty tashmal attazalluj wa attaza7luq 3ala al-jalid, mina arriyadhat asha2i3a allaty tatadhaman al-inzilaq fi ttadharis al-mughatat bi-athuluj ma3a azallajat aw law7 attazalluj 3ala qadamayk.

Ya7jiz mu3dham annas makanahum fi waqtin mubakkir (li-2anna al-qawarib 3adatan ma takunu mumtali2a khilal mawsim adhurwa).

Tullabi buyut ashabab i7tiyajat ashabab fil maqam al-awwal - fa-ddayf annamudhaji howa dhalika alladhy yakunu fil 3ishrinat mina al3umr - wa lakin ghaliban ma tajid musafirin akbar sinnan hunak aydhan.
Mu3dham al-ma3abid ladayha 3id sanawy yabda2 min nihayat November wa 7atta muntasaf Mayo, wa alladhy yakhtalifu wifqan li-ttaqwim assanawy li-kulli ma3bad.

Tu3addu al mamalek aththlath wa7ida min akthar al 3usur damawiyya fi tari5 dawlat As-sinal-qadima, idh laqa alaf al ashkhas masra3ahum wahom yatana7arun min ajl al julus fi a3la 3arsh bil qaser al kabir fi Xi'an.

Li su2 al 7az, 3indama tastakhdem mushaghel aqras, fa sa taqta3 7awafahu aydan 3ala al arja7, w edha kana maqta3 al video yadom tarjamat shashah bi al qurb min al juz2 al sufliy lelghaya, fa innaha lan tazhar bil kamel.

Ta2kadat isabat batta bi enflwnza attuyur H5N1, tamma al-3uthur 3alayha mayyita fi mustanqa3at Lyon sharq Faransa.

Tamma taqdim shara2it attasbith fi waqtin mubakkirin bima yakfi li tathbit almasarat fi makaniha. Wa m3a dhalik, adraku anna almasarat satakunu akthara kafa2atan idha kan ladayhim safi7a min al7adid fi al-a3la.

tamaththalat al ahdaf al ra2isiyya al Italiyya fi al duwal al Afriqiyya. Lel saytara 3ala hadhihi al buldan, saya7tajun ila minassat etlaq lel quwat, 7atta tatamakan al quwat min al eb7ar 3abra al ba7r al abyad al moutawasset wa ghazuw Afriqya.

I3taqada ba3dhu annas bi annahu kana mu7iqqan, wa lakin alkathir mina annas qad i3taqadu 3aksa dhalik: ay anna annizam ashamsy yata7arrak 7awla al-2ardh, bima fi dhalika ashams (wa 7atta annugum al-ukhra).
